means: 战胜( surmount的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The island is surmounted by a huge black castle.
sentence.Network_cn: 岛的最高处耸立着一座巨大的黑色城堡。

sentence.Network_en: She was well aware of the difficulties that had to be surmounted.
sentence.Network_cn: 她很清楚必须克服哪些困难。

sentence.Network_en: I think most of these obstacles can be surmounted.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为这些障碍大多数都是可以克服的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: surmountable 可越过的, surmounted 长脚半圆拱, surmounted 超半圆
We suffered great hardships , but we surmounted all our difficulties ., 苦头是吃了不少 , 但是困难都胜利渡过了.

list.abs: It can surmount obstacles , eulogize differences , stimulate inspirations and bring about instructive effects and wealth ., 它可以跨越障碍 , 颂扬差异 , 激发灵感 , 带来教益 , 创造财富.
surging 涌surmounted arch 超半圆拱surmounted vault 超半圆拱
they are brave in to innovate , in surmount oneself while also changing Kunming real estate pattern ;他们勇于创新，在超越自己的同时也在改变着昆明地产格局；
they surmount one crag after another .他们登上一块又一块的峭壁。

entry.def: If you surmount a problem or difficulty, you deal successfully with it.

example.ex: I realized I had to surmount the language barrier.
example.tran: 我意识到我不得不克服语言障碍。

entry.def: If something is surmounted by a particular thing, that thing is on top of it.

example.ex: The island is surmounted by a huge black castle.
example.tran: 岛的最高处耸立着一座巨大的黑色城堡。

auth_sentence.content: Population decline will leaded to other problems but they will be surmounted.
auth_sentence.res_content: Population decline will leaded to other problems but they will be surmounted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Population decline will leaded to other problems but they will be surmounted.

auth_sentence.content: These horological mainstays are surmounted by tradition-busting black-on-black, black-on-red or black-on-blue hands.
auth_sentence.res_content: These horological mainstays are surmounted by tradition-busting black-on-black, black-on-red or black-on-blue hands.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These horological mainstays are surmounted by tradition-busting black-on-black, black-on-red or black-on-blue hands.

auth_sentence.content: Both cities, proud and venerable capitals, had surmounted the tumul tuous collapse of the Soviet era.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both cities, proud and venerable capitals, had surmounted the tumul tuous collapse of the Soviet era.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both cities, proud and venerable capitals, had surmounted the tumul tuous collapse of the Soviet era.
